/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package examples

import examples.DtoModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template EntityDto filled up
 * with the content of the model [examples.DtoModel].
 */
object EntityDto {

    fun renderTemplate(model: DtoModel): String {
        return """
          |
          |
          |data class ${model.entityCapitalized}Dto(
          |  val ${model.entityField}: String,
          |  val lastname: String,
          |) {
          |${ if(model.model.generateToString)  { """
              |  fun toString(): String {
              |    return "${model.entityCapitalized}[${super.toString()}]"
              |  }
              |
          """ }  else  { """
          """ } }
          |
          |}
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }
}
